Package de.businesscode.bcdui.wrs.load

Class VirtualBindingItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.businesscode.bcdui.binding.SimpleBindingItem
      • de.businesscode.bcdui.binding.BindingItem
        • de.businesscode.bcdui.wrs.load.VirtualBindingItem
  • public class VirtualBindingItem
extends BindingItem
    Constructs a virtual BindingItem, behaves like a standard BindingItem but derives its sql expression and type-name from a wrq:Calc element
